Толпы разных монстров,постепенно нарастающие с каждой волной. Выживающие в нём разные персонажи, каждый со своими способностями и умениями. Разнообразие вооружения, от пистолето и ножа , до бензопилы и базуки, что ещё нужно игрокам?)))
Кроме конечно, костюмом для героев, сезонные карты и изменения вида монстров под каждый сезон ))

Могу сказать, что в нее до сих пор играют!! Это здорово, но это так же показывает, что далеко не всем преглянулась вторая часть и это печально. Ну ладно о чем это я, ведь мы говорим про первую часть и она великолепна. 
Тут есть все для веселого время провождения: выбор стволов, не самая плохая графика на момент выхода, убойный и подходящий саунд, толпы мобов, нобор сложностей и пользовательские карты + мультиплеер.
Из минусов не самая топовая оптимизация (однако какое должно быть ведро чтоб не потянуть эту игру?), ее время прошло (падает онлайн) ну собственно и все.
                                                Рекомендую к ознакомлению

Killing Floor tells the story of Booker T. DeWitt, a private detective hired to investigate the kidnapping of Dosh by an ancient race of sentient machines known as "The Reapers". The "Reapers" live underground and use emergence holes to access the world above. Aided by his old friend Victor Sullivan they must retrieve an item known as the Cintamani Stone in order to fight an invasion by a terrifying parasitic alien horde known as The Flood. 
The game Stars Bill Cosby as the voice of The Fleshpund and a musical score by Michael Buble and performances by the cast of smash hit broadway musical 'Cats'.
Killing Floor is a quirky, indie romp with a fantastic performance from Ellen Page as Mr. Fosters love interest.
I heartily recommend this game to anyone who loves 2d sidesrolling platformers

This game is what you'd called a "Horde Mode" where you fight off increasingly difficult waves of monsters each round, however this is co-op based and there are shops mid-game (probably what TF2 stole from them for MVM) where you can buy better weapons, body armour and so on. The higher the score the more cash and most train to get the best cash so when the boss appears you can counter him with a rocket launcher, but even then he isn't that easy.

I have found myself having a alot of fun with this game and if the mechanic I mentioned sounds good to you I'd give it a go, however the creatures are creepy so trying to single player the missions can be terrorfying and difficult.

This game is addicting and a real fun time... When they stop messing with it! I have owned this game for a few years now, and I only get to actually play it about 30% of the times I attempt to load. Servers constantly refuse to communicate with myself, I have yet to be able to actually invite a friend into a game, as we get the ever-nauseating "Server not responding" message... And this is all made worse every time they decide to do a "holiday special" update, which makes 80% of the servers unreliable. If it ain't broke, don't fix it. Learn this lesson.

Jogo Fantástico !!
-Uma prova que jogo, não se resume a gráfico e sim diversão !
-100% baseado em trabalho de equipe, pouco se faz jogando sozinho nesse jogo, se o fizer exigirá muita prática e habilidade do jogador.
-Um arsenal gigantesco, desde pistolas, shotguns, smg's, rifles, bazucas, lança chamas até armas desintegradoras futuristas !
-Grande variedade de Specimens ou ZED's, desde os clots até o patriarch que representa um verdadeiro desafio ao trabalho de equipe.
-Grande variedade de mapas,skins feitos pela comunidade steam.
-DLC's que acrescentam personagens,armas,etc(mas recomendo esperar um desconto de 50-75% e comprar o pacote completo,pois as dlcs são muito caras para adicionar pouco conteúdo, e a pior parte é que sempre tem uma dlc nova que é lançada, obrigando o jogador a sempre comprar uma dlc).
-NOTA=9.0, só não dei nota máxima, porque o jogo é meio careiro em questão de conteúdo adicional(DLC) !

With so much gore, carnage, and replayability what's not to love about this zombie shooter? There's a levelable class system that encourages different playstyles depending on if you wanna slice em, shoot em, explode em, or just watch em burn. The free seasonal updates are an added bonus that helps keep the game feeling fresh. Keep in mind that this is indeed an FPS and requires quick reaction time and thinking for those times the zombies just seem too much. There are different difficulties to ease beginners into the game while giving the veteran players a challenge the further they progress through the game.

Killing Floor is easily among my top 5 party games. While the campaign may lack some fun and exciting features, with the right group of people you may find your heart pounding, adrenaline rushing, and sweat coming out of you like a water fall and even then, that’s just round one. This game is enticing and I will always be up for playing with any of my partners to kill off all them zombies. Happy Hunting!

Lack of graphical fidelity, technical issues, and age may throw you off, but as soon as you start playing, you'll realize what makes this 4+ year old game still entertaining even after 90 hours. Wave based combat against zombies is not a new idea and has been seen many times, but no other game masters the idea as well as Killing Floor. Maps are plentiful and expertly created and the actual zombies (or zeds as they are called in the game) are varied, disturbing, and dangerous. Dozens of weapons help with play value, and thats before solid dlc. Whats more surprising than anything however, is the games impressive ability to hold a community after all this time, and continue to support the game with content. Brutally challanging, amazingly entertaining solo or with friends, and cheap, Killing Floor is a steal
